meanings: make[institute, bring forward, put in] a claim for compensation

vlive.korean: 그래서 공연장에서도 클레임이 많이 들어왔죠. So we received so many claims. 듣기 View video INFINITE : INFINITE DONG WOO&HOYA’s 인피니트 동우&호야 X 같이먹어요
vlive.english: So we received so many claims.

vlive.korean: 그냥 난 클레임 거는 게 재미있어 죽겠다 그렇게 말씀을 하세요. Just say that you love to complain. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : 텔레씨네 <아이리시어퍼컷> 5화
vlive.english: Just say that you love to complain.

vlive.korean: 많은 분들이 클레임 거시고 계시거든요? - 왜? 불편해 보인다고? So many people are commenting on it. - Why? Are they saying you look uncomfortable? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] 9MUSES X LieV - 나인뮤지스의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: So many people are commenting on it. - Why? Are they saying you look uncomfortable?

vlive.korean: [자칭 심리전 고수] - 이런 심리전은 제가 잘하기 때문에 - 오케이! [Self-claimed master of psychological game] - I'm good at psychological games. - Okay. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
vlive.english: [Self-claimed master of psychological game] - I'm good at psychological games. - Okay.

vlive.korean: 본인 고른 거... Claim your snacks! 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#378. 열려라 에이티즈 (스페셜 DJ AOA 지민&찬미 with 에이티즈)

examples.korean: If you agree to withdraw your claim, we would be glad to restart the project. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 귀사가 클레임을 취하하는 데 동의하시면, 당사는 기꺼이 프로젝트에 재착수하겠습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: If you agree to withdraw your claim, we would be glad to restart the project. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: John forwarded me your e-mail regarding a possible claim because I generally deal with the legal issues. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 법적 문제는 보통 제가 처리하기 때문에 John이 발생 가능성이 있는 클레임에 대한 귀하의 메일을 저에게 전달했습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: John forwarded me your e-mail regarding a possible claim because I generally deal with the legal issues. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I'm afraid we've got a claim on our hands. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 처리해야 할 클레임이 한 건 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: I'm afraid we've got a claim on our hands. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There's a claim against the goods we exported last month. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지난달에 수출한 물건에 클레임이 걸렸다 Neungyule
examples.english: There's a claim against the goods we exported last month. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Claims have been filed against the products we exported last month. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지난달에 수출한 물건에 클레임이 걸렸다 Neungyule
examples.english: Claims have been filed against the products we exported last month. Add to Wordbook
